name: com.antigravity.editor
description: Antigravity editor integration for supporting Antigravity as code editor for Unity. Adds support for generating csproj files for intellisense purposes, auto discovery of installations, etc.

_upm.changelog:
1.1.17:
- Fix: Added missing meta file for AntigravityMenus.cs to resolve import issues in Unity

1.1.16:
- Fix: Changed accessibility of Editor class and menu methods to public to ensure menu items appear in Unity

1.1.15:
- Add: Antigravity/DotRush menu item for simple attach-only launch.json generation

1.1.14:
- Add: Antigravity/settings.json generation menu
- Fix: macOS launch.json request type changed to 'attach'

1.1.13:
- Fix: launch.json 디버거 타입 'unity'로 변경 (vstuc에서 변경)
- Fix: launch.json 설정에 program 경로 추가

1.1.12:
- Fix: Dictionary 중복 키 오류 해결 (.NET 4.7 호환)
- Fix: DistinctBy 대신 foreach + ContainsKey 사용

1.1.11:
- Add: Antigravity Settings 메뉴 추가 (Unity > Antigravity > Settings)
- Add: .vscode/launch.json 자동 생성 기능
- Fix: 파일 손상으로 인한 컴파일 오류 복구

1.1.10:
- Fix: Changed launch.json debugger type from 'vstuc' to 'unity' for proper Antigravity debugging support

1.1.9:
- Add: Created missing AntigravityBaseInstallation interface and base class
- Add: Created missing VisualStudioCodiumInstallation class for Codium support
- Fix: Resolved all CS0246 compilation errors for missing type references

1.1.8:
- Fix: Regenerated all 59 .meta files with unique GUIDs to resolve conflicts with Cursor IDE package
- Fix: Antigravity now loads correctly and appears in External Script Editor dropdown

1.1.7:
- Fix: GUID 충돌 해결 (Cursor IDE와의 중복 GUID)
- Fix: Assembly definition이 올바르게 로드되도록 수정

1.1.6:
- Fix: Ensure Antigravity always appears in External Script Editor dropdown even if not installed
- Improvement: Users can now manually browse for Antigravity installation path

1.1.5:
- Fix: Assembly definition name corrected for Unity Package Manager compatibility

1.1.4:
- Fix: Corrected InternalsVisibleTo assembly references
- Fix: Changed AntigravityExternalEditor class from public to internal for proper initialization
- Fix: Fixed metadata references to match Antigravity namespace

1.1.0:
- Major Refactor: Ported from com.unity.ide.cursor structure
- Added .csproj generation support
- Improved process management
- Added reuse window option
